alert.note: Alert for Dawson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 10:02PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Dawson County through 1045 PM CDT... At 1001 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Maxwell, or 17 miles east of North Platte, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cozad, Gothenburg and Willow Island. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 209 and 222. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
